user.description: User can edit all values except that of date joined.

projects.description: User can define their project with a name, can tick or untick finished and can edit preset values of: date started, timespent and moneyspent. These preset values follow date started and cost of materials but are free to edit

material.description: When a user makes or edits a project, they can either choose an existing template with preset quantity type, name and cost. A copy will be made for the database. The user can still edit their cost and amount in their own copy.
